alert.note: Alert for East Otter Tail; Grant; West Otter Tail (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 19 at 6:08PM CST until February 22 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH LATE MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches possible. * WHERE...Grant, West Otter Tail and East Otter Tail Counties. * WHEN...From late Sunday night through late Monday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: East Otter Tail; Grant; West Otter Tail
